topic.title: How to build a website in ZeroNet
topic.body:
I didn't know where to start so I Googled it. It seems pretty straight forward. I'll check it out when I get home and Update
Create a new site:
https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using_zeronet/create_new_site/

Sample sites (with source code)
https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using_zeronet/sample_sites/
